title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson are 'sober' as he shares title of new song with photo of her necklaces
text:
Love is in the air for these powerhouse musicians.

And Miley Cyrus didn't have to look too far from her circle to find a new lover in Cody Simpson after ending things with husband Liam Hemsworth earlier this year followed by a brief fling with Kaitlynn Carter.

Sources told People magazine that Miley and Cody are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety as he teased his new song for the pop-star titled Golden Thing.

Miley Cyrus didn't have to look too far from her circle to find a new lover in Cody Simpson after ending things with husband Liam Hemsworth earlier this year followed by a brief fling with Kaitlynn Carter; the couple were spotted grabbing coffee on Sunday

'It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realize,' Cody's manager Matt Zeidman told the publication.

'Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they're both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me.'

Simpson recently revealed during the Tiffany & Co. Mens launch that they 'found each other again in a space where we're both not partying' and 'working real hard.'

A mood: Sources told People that Miley and Cody are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety as he teased his new song for the pop-star titled Golden Thing

Cody definitely seems enamored with his new love interest as he shared an update about a song she forced him to release.

'golden thing. friday,' he wrote of the release date of new music. 'presave in bio.'

The 22-year-old Australian heartthrob penned the sweet song for his lover while she was on bed rest following a tonsillitis scare.

'She was like, 'If you don't put this s*** out, I'm putting it out on your behalf for you. I'm getting your Spotify login and doing this s*** myself,'' Simpson said.

Happiness: With Halloween right around the corner, the pair seem to be getting ready for a festive evening

And with Halloween right around the corner, the pair seem to be getting ready for a festive evening.

'We're trying to think about costumes right now,' Cody said. 'I have no idea. I really want to go see the new Joker movie because I'm a really big fan of the Health [Ledger] version.

'I've done that for Halloween a couple of times, so I was thinking of going and seeing that and maybe doing ... I don't know. I have no plans.'
description: Miley and Cody are deeply focused on each other and their ongoing efforts with sobriety as he teased his new song for the pop-star titled Golden Thing.
